content.content: I hope this script helps Bob address his issue of being unable to download the "compress.py" file from Emma Johnson's  "file_compression" GitHub repository by asking him to clone the repository rather than sending the file as an email attachment. The second issue reminds everyone to avoid sending emails to Bob and explains that Emma Johnson herself will send the file directly via email this time.
